name: Amazon DynamoDB
short: A fully managed NoSQL database service on AWS that provides fast and predictable performance with seamless scalability.
description: Amazon DynamoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database service, providing seamless scalability and consistent millisecond-level latency. It supports both document and key-value data models, catering to diverse application needs. With features like automatic partitioning, in-memory caching, and event-driven programming, it offers high-performance at any scale. It's integrated with AWS security, backup, and monitoring services. DynamoDB is cost-effective, charging for read/write capacity, storage, and optional features. Ideal for applications requiring low-latency data access.
